lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I am a contemporary artist (painting, mixed media and gourd art) interested in art which reflects or expresses social and environmental themes.

lender.name: Vere
lender.loan_because: We all need support and help sometimes in our life, I know I do. I would also like to support and make a difference in someone else life.
lender.occupational_info:
I am an at home mum/wife/business woman, with two young and lively boys as well as three grown children who are already making their own way in life.
I love, and am very passionate about what I do, being inspired by beauty in all things. I take Inspirational, Creative and Fun pictures for Milika Creative Arts Inspiration-Feel Good Gallery & Online Stores.

lender.name: Laura and Jim
lender.loan_because: we are lucky enough to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: Laura works with video games while Jim works in restaurants.

lender.name: Caley
lender.loan_because: Every year, my cousins give me a Kiva gift certificate of $25 so I use that to make loans. It's a lot more fun than I expected.
lender.occupational_info: I dont know.

lender.name: Kerstin
lender.occupation: Sr. Project Manager for Online Media
lender.loan_because: life is lived best when one cares about the next.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: Freely you have received; freely give.

lender.name: Saurabh
lender.loan_because: by the grace of God, I am fortunate enough.

lender.name: Katie
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to become a marine scientist.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: Loaning through Kiva gives me the opportunity to "Do unto others as others have done unto me." I have been blessed and hope to share the blessing with many other people around the world.

lender.name: MFB
lender.loan_because: I have had the privilege to live in prosperous countries with virtually unlimited quantities of drinking water at my disposal, in fact I bathe in drinking water, wash my car, water my plants and flush my toilet with it. I've had the opportunity to get a decent education and have always had enough to eat and a roof over my head and a heated dwelling when I've needed it. I've also been fortunate enough to visit countries where the inhabitants had none of these necessities. if my loans help people to help themselves I am grateful to have that opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I write stories with humour and a bite.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I believe that changing the world is up to us. One action at a time.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I am a big supporter of credit unions and co ops. I also like the "leg up" not "hand out" nature of Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I examine eyes and provide treatment for some eye disease, glasses and contact lenses.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: It is enjoyable to become connected to many fine people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a coach of the sport lacrosse. I like teaching kids how to participate in sports.

lender.name: claire
lender.loan_because: $20 can go a long way!

lender.name: Alex, Tara and Finnley
lender.loan_because: we can
lender.occupational_info: I study climate change

lender.name: Chuck
lender.loan_because: It's empowering to me and to others.
lender.occupational_info: I build answers to questions by finding good sources of information on the internet and making databases out of them. Esoteric, right? But I can go into a much longer explanation if you like :)

lender.name: Herbert-Family
lender.loan_because: My family wants to help.
lender.occupational_info: I was a trial lawyer. My wife is a registered nurse (hospice). Our children are a teacher, landscape gardner, hospital efficiency planner and a university student (Sociology).

lender.name: TylerK
lender.loan_because: It gives me an opportunity to help others

lender.name: Kalina
lender.loan_because: I want to help others make their dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I research and write about the American Civil War. I also work as an editor for a college textbook company.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: It's a great opportunity to connect in some way to people that otherwise seem distant.

lender.name: steve
lender.loan_because: To lend a hand to those who are seeking to make the most of their opportunities.

lender.name: Mitchell
lender.loan_because: I believe in you.

lender.name: GLV
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us, so we can bless others.
lender.occupational_info: When our children are in school, I volunteer in our public school and church. When in kids are home, it is homework, sports, music and fun! My husband is the love of my life!

lender.name: Nathaniel
lender.loan_because:
I am looking to help individuals in developing countries find ways to get on that first wrung of economic development and sustainability (Jeffery Sachs).
This is one of the only ways I know of to help usher in a new age of global equity, integrity and harmony.
lender.occupational_info: Community Based Partnerships for environmentally safe energy and resource protection.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage people to step out and offer their talents to the world for the betterment of themselves and others.
lender.occupational_info: I design processes and methods for manufacturing and machining products.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of empowering others to do their best work.
lender.occupational_info: I love to capture the spirit of a place or person through my photoraphy.

lender.name: mohammad
lender.loan_because: i want to buy taxi and i have some money but need in more, to buy taxi and earn money and will pay back soon.
lender.occupational_info: I have little money, and want to buy taxi, so i will need some more money to buy taxi car to earn money for my faimly, and to back loan

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: The need is so great and I can help, and I want to support Kiva in its mission.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find their true calling and shape it into a viable career.

lender.name: William (Bill) Miner
lender.loan_because: Simply... to help.
lender.occupational_info: My business offers training and information to help people become better managers and leaders.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: This started with a gift from my children, and I am grateful that they have so honored me.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired and work to live a life that reflects justice and peace. This includes sharing my money and my time with a variety of organizations.

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: just trying to help
lender.occupational_info: I am a stock clerk at publix supermarkets...I put grocerys on the shelves.

lender.name: Patrick Halloran
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone in one way or another should help those around them. Working together and helping those in need is what makes great things become together.
lender.occupational_info: Parachute Rigger

lender.name: Simply A Pound
lender.loan_because: To relieve hardship or distress throughout the world, in particular but not exclusively, by: (i) providing financial assistance to persons in need for the purposes of providing healthcare, education and housing

lender.name: Give More. Use Less.
lender.loan_because:
Give More. Use Less. Four words that must save humankind.
Check my journey on my blog.

lender.name: Lesley Moseley
lender.loan_because: I used to spend a lot of money on massages, but feel the money can be better spent giving others a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: "Go where there is no path, and leave a trail : Ralph Waldo Emmerson". Sharing the bountious blessings the Universe showers on me.

lender.name: Christina
lender.occupation: Instructor of blind and deaf children

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: it is a positive way of helping those who strive to create a better life for themselves and their familes
lender.occupational_info: Business Consultant who helps companies solve problems and build their businesses.

lender.name: Gbenga
lender.loan_because: Most of the stories here might just remind me of me, I am grateful to God, I made it through those days, I sometimes imagine where can help come from.
lender.occupational_info: I love what i do, I meet high technological challenges. Use my intelect to solve real problems that affects lives.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I can and because as a woman who is a business owner it is my obligation to make this oportunity available to other women. And then I get to watch them grow too. Can you think of many things better than that in the world?
lender.occupational_info: All consuming, heady, poetic and fullfilling. I am a Chinese Medicine doctor.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of each person to change her or his own life. Many people have ideas and just need a little financial support to get things going. I want these people to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I am training to be a scientist, so I can empathize with the concept of ideas that need some funding.

lender.name: Leo and Madeline
lender.occupation: Field service supervisor and City Hall emp. superv

lender.name: Trent
lender.loan_because: My big brother cared

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: There are many poor people out there, and were complaining about how uncomforatable somthing is.they dont even have stuff to complain about.

lender.name: Laurel
lender.loan_because: Am lending on behalf of family - we were given Kiva credits as gifts.
lender.occupational_info: I work supporting volunteers (unpaid workers) to provide aid to local people in financial difficulties.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: it's great to be helping others who are working hard to better their own lives and those of their families.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I want to have a positive impact on the world and because I want to know that I am directly affecting someone with the money that I donate.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school so that I can learn and someday get a job.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur myself and would like to help others to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I make entertainment videos for the web

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I am successful through the charity of my family and the government many years ago when I was living far below the poverty line in our country. I made a plan and reached my goals. I want to help others to do the same.

lender.name: Jemma Mae
lender.loan_because: a little credit can go a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I organize community events for an environmental non-profit.

lender.name: Amit
lender.loan_because: I have faith on you

lender.name: Scott
lender.occupational_info: I analyze DNA to help solve criminal cases.

lender.name: ä½•
lender.loan_because: Sorry,I am not good at English,I am a university graduater and preparing to set up a company that is to offer raise fuel-efficient additives producation,but a lack of start-up money,but also lack of liquidity,please help me.
lender.occupational_info: I will offer the raise fuel-efficient additives production,maybe the production would help us to reduse the fuel consumption,the ultimate goals of reducing greenhouse-gas emissions would be to come true.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I care about others. Many people have helped me.
lender.occupational_info: We help people get well and stay healthy by preventing illness.

lender.name: Liz & Matt
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: what goes around comes around.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure networks like the Internet can be used by everyone.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: I want to see people reach their full potential.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist and a teacher. I paint murals in my free time and I teach art to middle school students.

lender.name: Rekha
lender.loan_because: I want to give equal chance to everyone to grow

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Nick & Dimitra
lender.loan_because: GOD has put it in my heart to help others. He has blessed me with a wonderful wife and 4 healthy children. I believe that if you help someone, they will in turn help someone else. This will in turn lead to love and caring which through GOD will make the world a better place for all. :) GOD Bless!

lender.name: Cassie
lender.loan_because: i know that people sometimes need help, and i know it feels good to know that not all people out there turn a blind eye on those who need help. i like knowing that i can help to change this world.
lender.occupational_info: life is my #1 occupation, just trying to get through it without blundering around too much, i'm a middle school student, a friend and part of a family, it might not sound like much but it's pretty much a full time job : )

lender.name: Nikola
lender.loan_because: I believe I have been given abundantly, and I want to share that abundance with people who believe. This small loan will change the life of someone I've never met, and that is POWERFUL!

lender.name: Mark
lender.occupational_info: college student

lender.name: j.r.
lender.loan_because: Each one of us can make the difference. World peace is not just a dream.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office on a computer.

lender.name: Marg
lender.loan_because: I believe in prudent lending to individuals in need of assistance to make a difference in their livelihood and community. Small businesses is what makes the difference everywhere.
lender.occupational_info: I lent money to businesses in Canada for 25 yrs. from one man shops to big corporations.

lender.name: Elissa
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student in music history, and I hope to teach music in a university.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I have been in a tough position and wish to help people who need help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a freelance writer.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because:
I think this is a fantastic way to enable people less fortunate than me to learn about business and hopefully become successful through their trials and efforts.
What a fantastic way to help people become self-sufficient!
lender.occupational_info:
I believe each of us has the desire to either build, or be apart of something that provides a good or service, whereby we develop and nurture the innate desire in all of us to be productive and contribute to society.
I am an entrepreneur myself, having done well in technology (started a business with some friends, grew it, and sold it six years later). I continue to educate myself through investing in more businesses of my own, and the businesses of other entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I enjoy seeing others succeed

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: Greed is too prevalent in our society. I have to offset it somehow.
lender.occupational_info: I work with finances to figure out budgets, profits, and methods to make the business more productive.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I'd like to see world peace in my lifetime.
lender.occupational_info: We write software that small businesses use to keep track of their documents, projects, and clients.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: I believe that every small thing you do to help people has ramifications in the wider world.
lender.occupational_info: I use the Internet to help people grow their business

lender.name: Riza
lender.loan_because: I neded,because my home not have electricity
lender.occupational_info: I have wood store and I run it with my brother

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference; however one pair of hands can only do so much. Yet many hands make light work of even the toughest obstacles.
lender.occupational_info: You know when some boffin comes on the TV and says that this or that is happening in the environment? Ever wonder where there information comes from? Well, it comes from people like me. I am one of the field personnel for the government department where I work, so basically they give me a 4x4 and a boat and tell me to go there and take samples. Yes, I know I have a great job!

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I want to help promote ending poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people with deafness and disabilities

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I have travelled a lot in India,Thailand,Mexico and South America. I have seen a lot of poverty and realise the need to support people who are willing to support themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I was a sheep farmer who now works as a house builder.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Shahrokh Dabiri
lender.loan_because: I'm always ready to be help. I enjoy helping people.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: It's awesome

lender.name: Norma
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed and want to help those who are less fortunate.

lender.name: Cody Boyte
lender.loan_because: I believe the incentives in a loan are much better than the incentives in a handout. It works out better for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I am a salesman for a startup company that is changing the way businesses are bought and sold.

lender.name: Pierre
lender.loan_because: I want to give people the opportunity to fulfill their true potential and become successful.
lender.occupational_info: I coach Business people to be more effective in the areas of Marketing, Planning, Staffing, Incentives and Customer Service.

lender.name: Project Mogul
lender.loan_because: Project Mogul feels that building industry in third world countries is better than direct income transfers.

lender.name: Toffer Surovec
lender.loan_because: I want to help people live their dreams while I work on mine.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an artist. I work mostly with words.

lender.name: Kjell
lender.loan_because: Being priveleged by having a good life, itÂ´s a pleasure beinga able to help somebody else.

lender.name: Sirpa
lender.loan_because: "...Never give up on your dreams.." - *Paulo Coelho -

lender.name: Assad and Vesna
lender.loan_because: this website is a great idea and allows people to help themselves. It's also a sustainable form of charity that I can take part in over the long term.
lender.occupational_info: I work in finance in London and my wife Vesna is a teacher.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work to develop programs and policies that prevent violence against women.

lender.name: Philip Thomas
lender.loan_because: Supporting local communities and investing in social capital at the micro-level is probably one of the most effective, and ethical ways of challenging global inequalities in wealth. My view is that it is particularly important to support women in Asia, Africa and Central/Southern America.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked in the past as a psychiatrist in the UK, and as an academic with an interest in philosophy. I am also chair of a community development NGO, Sharing Voices Bradford http://www.sharingvoices.org.uk/.

lender.name: Omar
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Event management, marketing and promotions for the hospitality industry.

lender.name: Maschi
lender.loan_because: Sometimes someone is in need and sometimes someone is able to give. It's as simple as that.

lender.name: James Walker
lender.loan_because: It helps others who don't have the same opportunities as me, it's a great hobby and it's helping me to learn about the lives of other people I wouldn't normally meet.
lender.occupational_info: I am a managing director of Credit Suisse, a large Swiss financial institution. I am responsible for running Credit Suisse's global telecommunications network.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference. I hope this makes it possible for people to find their purpose.
lender.occupational_info: I facilitate a CEO group of entrepreneurs in the Annapolis/Baltimore/Washington area.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I'm a banker...and I want to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: God has provided more than I need, and trusts me to share with others.
lender.occupational_info: sharing the good news of God's love

lender.occupational_info: I promote the proper allocation of public funds to support biological discoveries that will improve the quality of our lives.

lender.name: Colin and Evan
lender.loan_because: it's a great idea!
lender.occupational_info: We're homeschoolers, and happy.

lender.name: Jody
lender.loan_because: we have to take care of each other
lender.occupational_info: What I can do, I will try.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: It is important to work together around the world as one people.
lender.occupational_info: I teach reading, writing, science, math and social studies to 9 & 10 year olds.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I want to make a real impact in someone's life and
lender.occupational_info: I do web and graphic design for small businesses and nonprofit organizations

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: Everyone has the right and deserves the chance to be successful.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: In memory of my late sister Patricia Pautsch her account will remain open and the money from repaid loans will continue to be loaned out, to help with the dreams of others .

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I don't do enough to help others. These entrepreneurs aren't asking for anything but a chance to improve their lives.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I truly believe that investing in people, instead of just giving them money... is the best way to empower them.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently in the process of getting a degree in International Relations/Development...which would enable me to work for organizations like KIVA :-)

lender.name: Donald/Scott
lender.loan_because: We like the idea of helping people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info:
Donald is an Art Director at Suffolk University in Boston. He is responsible for the look of the printed materials (brochures, catalogs, invitations, etc.) used by the university.
Scott is the Associate Vice President for Enrollment Services at Salem State College. He is responsible for recruitment and student services.

lender.name: Marsha
lender.occupation: on behalf of CA I&D Ambassadors

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Canada has so much yet there are so many in the rest of world who have so little.

lender.name: WCT
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make the lives for their families a little better.
lender.occupational_info: Keep people and things moving

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a little bit of a difference wherever I can.
lender.occupational_info: living and learning

lender.name: Rae
lender.loan_because: I believe that true empowerment grows from being supported and encouraged to strive and achieve.
lender.occupational_info: I am in training to become a psychologist. As a psychologist, I work with people to overcome difficulties and make changes to improve their lives.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I want to help others and microfinance is a great way to do so
lender.occupational_info: I work with Junior Achievement, a world-wide charity focused on youth and helping them thrive through education in the areas of financial literacy and entrepreneurialism.

lender.name: harry
lender.loan_because: It helps people worse off then me to start a good life.

lender.name: carol
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: ian
lender.loan_because: Through these small responsible actions in combination with others i hope to contribute to positive change and an overall more sustainable economic and environmental conscious world.

lender.name: Stephanie Grutzmacher
lender.loan_because: this program has great potential to address global poverty. I want to directly loan to those who can develop businesses selling healthy foods in their communities.
lender.occupational_info: Research and teaching in the areas of public health and sociology.

lender.name: Allan
lender.loan_because: I believe it is the best way to help people in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: I teach students who are blind to read braille and travel safely.

lender.name: joff
lender.occupational_info: Preventing pollution of the aquatic environment.

lender.name: Susanne
lender.loan_because: I believe I am extremely fortunate for the blessings and opportunities I enjoy as a Canadian citizen. Travelling to other parts of the world has not only made me appreciate my home but instilled a desire in me to share my good fortune with others as well.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: I believe we should foster true global community any way we can.
